name: Geisha Glitch
description:
Digital Noise Frontier collaborated with Domenico Barra on this epic Geisha Glitch audio/visual assault. Glitch meets databending. 
The first time Geisha gif was published on Tumblr in 2014 on Dirty New Media microblog.
The gif count to date 03/10/2021 33,229 notes since Nov 24th, 2016 on Domenico's Tumblr http://dombarra.tumblr.com On http://dirtynewmedia.tumblr.com (now offline) it reached +130.000.
The loop was glitched by altering the data in the stream of the .gif format. Then, it was processed through dithering. 

Another Domenico's piece remixed in this visual is HeartGlitchBeat. It was his thank you to Hic Et Nunc community.

Digital Noise Frontier added the heavy noise beat, editing and it's own glitch style .

File MPEG 4 Codec H.264
